plot: The Peanuts Gang competes in a punt, pass and kick contest. The winner gets a new bicycle and a trip to the Super Bowl. Meanwhile, Snoopy coaches the Birds football team (made up of a bunch of Woodstock-like birds) to the AFL (Animal Football League) Super Bowl.   Written by  Steven W. Siferd
title: You're in the Super Bowl, Charlie Brown!
plot_es: The Peanuts Gang competes in a punt, pass and kick contest. The winner gets a new bicycle and a trip to the Super Bowl. Meanwhile, Snoopy coaches the Birds football team (made up of a bunch of Woodstock-like birds) to the AFL (Animal Football League) Super Bowl.   Written by  Steven W. Siferd
original_name: You're in the Super Bowl, Charlie Brown!
plot_en: The Peanuts Gang competes in a punt, pass and kick contest. The winner gets a new bicycle and a trip to the Super Bowl. Meanwhile, Snoopy coaches the Birds football team (made up of a bunch of Woodstock-like birds) to the AFL (Animal Football League) Super Bowl.   Written by  Steven W. Siferd

cast.role: Linus Van Pelt / Kid Who Yells
cast.name: John Christian Graas
